mapper.sql: ID, SYSTEM_DIRECTORY_DOCUMENT_ID, REQUIREMENT_ID, DOCUMENT_NAME, DOCUMENT_VERSION, DOCUMENT_TYPE, SAVE_TYPE, DOCUMENT_S3_BUCKET, DOCUMENT_S3_KEY, DOCUMENT_MONGO_KEY, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_system_directory_document_history (ID, SYSTEM_DIRECTORY_DOCUMENT_ID, REQUIREMENT_ID, DOCUMENT_NAME, DOCUMENT_VERSION, DOCUMENT_TYPE, SAVE_TYPE, DOCUMENT_S3_BUCKET, DOCUMENT_S3_KEY, DOCUMENT_MONGO_KEY, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{systemDirectoryDocumentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{requirementId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{documentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{documentVersion,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{documentType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{saveType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{documentS3Bucket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{documentS3Key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{documentMongoKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update tbl_system_directory_document_history
SYSTEM_DIRECTORY_DOCUMENT_ID = #{systemDirectoryDocumentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REQUIREMENT_ID = #{requirementId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DOCUMENT_NAME = #{documentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCUMENT_VERSION = #{documentVersion,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DOCUMENT_TYPE = #{documentType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
SAVE_TYPE = #{saveType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DOCUMENT_S3_BUCKET = #{documentS3Bucket,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCUMENT_S3_KEY = #{documentS3Key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCUMENT_MONGO_KEY = #{documentMongoKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_system_directory_document_history set SYSTEM_DIRECTORY_DOCUMENT_ID = #{systemDirectoryDocumentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REQUIREMENT_ID = #{requirementId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DOCUMENT_NAME = #{documentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCUMENT_VERSION = #{documentVersion,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DOCUMENT_TYPE = #{documentType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SAVE_TYPE = #{saveType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DOCUMENT_S3_BUCKET = #{documentS3Bucket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCUMENT_S3_KEY = #{documentS3Key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCUMENT_MONGO_KEY = #{documentMongoKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT tsddh.id,tsddh.SYSTEM_DIRECTORY_DOCUMENT_ID as systemDirectoryDocumentId, tsddh.DOCUMENT_NAME as documentName,tsddh.DOCUMENT_VERSION as documentVersion, tsddh.CREATE_DATE as createDate,tui.USER_NAME as userName, -- tri.REQUIREMENT_NAME as requirementName,tri.REQUIREMENT_CODE as requirementCode FROM tbl_system_directory_document_history tsddh
-- LEFT JOIN tbl_requirement_info tri on tri.id=tsddh.REQUIREMENT_ID LEFT JOIN tbl_user_info tui on tui.id=tsddh.LAST_UPDATE_BY
WHERE tsddh.SYSTEM_DIRECTORY_DOCUMENT_ID =#{systemDirectoryDocumentId} and tsddh.status=1

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(tri.REQUIREMENT_NAME) as requirementNames FROM tbl_system_directory_document_requirement tsddr left join tbl_requirement_info tri on tri.id=tsddr.REQUIREMENT_ID where tsddr.SYSTEM_DIRECTORY_DOCUMENT_ID=#{systemDirectoryDocumentId}
